name: Dino Bus (Chrome's T-Rex Runner VS. Desert Bus)
name_original: Dino Bus (Chrome's T-Rex Runner VS. Desert Bus)
description:
No Internet

Try:

  • Playing this little game until your internet comes back
  • Going outside into the fresh air

ERR_INTERNET_DISCONNECTED

 

Controls

On Keyboard only:

  • Enter - Confirms and/or progresses to next screen.
  • Escape - Quit or go back to main menu.
  • Shift - Bus Horn (Meep, Meep!)
  • Arrow Keys - Up to Jump, Right to Accelerate (On Bus Mode).
